column4: hi, i use ubuntu lucid and firefox 3.6.7. When i try to download a file from web, it gives an error;  /tmp/G_wzxnBN..bin.part could not be saved, because the source file could not be read.  Try again later, or contact the server administrator.
if it is just a problem with the one file (or one site), then the error message is accurate.
i've face with this error in different sites
maybe try right-click/save file as, or there are a couple suggestions http://kb.mozillazine.org/Source_file_could_not_be_read
